verses.name: Job 3:16
verses.text: Or as an hidden untimely birth I had not been; as infants which never saw light.

verses.name: Job 3:17
verses.text: There the wicked cease from troubling; and there the weary be at rest.

verses.name: Job 3:18
verses.text: There the prisoners rest together; they hear not the voice of the oppressor.

verses.name: Job 3:19
verses.text: The small and great are there; and the servant is free from his master.

verses.name: Job 3:20
verses.text: Wherefore is light given to him that is in misery, and life unto the bitter in soul;

verses.name: Job 3:21
verses.text: Which long for death, but it cometh not; and dig for it more than for hid treasures;
